post:
I was going to write something new other than the copypasta writ that I've been using for years, but creative writing is not my forte, so ehh...

Tired of poor quality of service from The Other Guys? Come to IPXcore! We have great service and great true 24/7 support; you'll love us!

Our service for California is out of AIS Lightwave in San Diego.

Some company info: We've been up and running since May of 2011. We're running OpenVZ virtualization on our very own Dell, HP, and Supermicro -powered hardware. Each server node has its own gigabit connection. Past-30-days support ticket mean response time:  0 Day(s) 0 Hour(s) 17 Minute(s) and 22 Second(s)

The offer:  
CopperVZ:  
512mb of RAM  
96mb vSwap  
35gb of disk space  
750gb of monthly transfer @ 100mbit/sec  
1 IPv4 address  
10 IPv6 addresses (more available for free on request)  
San Diego, CA location  

$2.49/month with promotion code 512FOR249  

Click https://billingcp.us/cart.php?a=add&pid=81&carttpl=modern3&systpl=ipx3 to order! Be sure to apply promo code 512FOR249!  

FYI: As outlined in the AUP/TOS ( http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ ), all new account registrations MUST be made with verifiable postal address information. Repeating your province/state in the address fields will cause your account to be suspended til you update your account information.

These plans are auto-verified with Maxmind with strict settings; if you get auto-tagged for fraud, please open a support ticket for resolution. All plans are also subject to manual verifications.

You are encouraged to exercise the 3-day trial period (outlined in http://ipxcore.com/auptos/ in the Billing section ) and determine if this service will be right for you.

San Diego test IP: 209.112.254.18

We also do custom plans. Please contact us with your requirements.
